title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' option from the file menu does not work consistently. Specifically, after closing all editors and creating a new file f1.txt, selecting 'Close All Saved' does not produce any visible action or result.
EB: The 'Close All Saved' option from the file menu should close all open editors, including the newly created file f1.txt. After selecting this option, all editors should be closed, and the contents of f1.txt should be saved if any changes were made.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Use build 20020508 with the latest UI code. 2. Close all open editors. 3. Create a new file named f1.txt. 4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
